conclusion: Need to analyze flow patterns and positions of outlets A, B, C, and D.
The outlets are labeled A, B, C, and D.
The liquid flows out from the outlets in a specific pattern from the top left to the bottom right.
Outlet A is located at the top left corner.
Outlet B is located at the top right corner.
Outlet C is located at the bottom left corner.
Outlet D is located at the bottom right corner.
Liquid will flow into the container located at the bottom right corner (D).
